trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"></xref> that is published in the editing context and that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[wf2](~/add/includes/wf2-md.md)] designer is in a read-only state.
trans-unit.target: 表示<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"> </xref> ，它发布在编辑上下文和，该值指示是否[!INCLUDE[wf2](~/add/includes/wf2-md.md)]设计器处于只读状态。

trans-unit.source: Visual elements can bind to this property in order to provide different behavior in a read-only state (such as the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.ExpressionTextBox> disallowing edits and setting the state to “Disabled”).
trans-unit.target: 可视元素可以绑定到此属性，以便提供不同的行为，处于只读状态 (如<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.ExpressionTextBox>不允许编辑且将状态设置为"已禁用")。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.ExpressionTextBox>

trans-unit.source: If a hosting application would like to set the designer to a read-only state, this <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem> can be retrieved and can be set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果宿主应用程序想要设置设计器为只读状态，这<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem>可以检索，并且可以将设置为`false`。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.ReadOnlyState"></xref> class.
Gets a value that indicates whether the object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示对象是否为只读的。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果对象是只读的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the current object.
